caption: Hands down one of the best burger spots in Brooklyn! This place is definitely a must go if you haven’t gone already and if you have, you already know you’ll be back. I was there last weekend. The service was outstanding despite them being short staffed. Jacob was my server. As a matter of fact Jacob was the only server that day and he took care of all his tables with grace! I noticed the owner was there but wasn’t helpful at all. All he did was hover and stress out his staff. He didn’t check on the tables nor did he lend a hand in serving knowing he only had one server that day. As a customer I was a bit uncomfortable with his energy and disappointment that he wasn’t a team player. (You can’t run a business w/o your staff so treat them with respect and be a team player). Other then that the food was amazing and the plating was pretty. I will definitely be back and hopefully this time if the owner is there I hope he helps out. After all why be there if you aren’t going to help?

The service was very slow, it took about 30-40 minutes before the server came up to us to order drinks. And for the amount they're charging for a burger it wasn't that great. Also the onion rings were terrible. I bit into them and they were filled with oil. Just know when you order the sweet potatoes fries it will be a smaller portion than most would expect. Also be aware they charge 18% gratuity for you on your bill. Maybe service was so slow because there was only one server but the place had four tables seated so I don't understand what took so long. Wouldn't recommend.

Simply 5/5 because the food is really good. The service was very fast and the food left the kitchen within 15 mins. The presentation is very cute. Everything is organic and tasted fresh. I got the Weekender burger, Caesar salad and truffle fries. Everything was made perfectly, my favorite was the truffle fries. Their outdoor seating is nice as well. It’s very warm and cozy. I was served by Mike, very friendly server, very caring and fast. I highly recommend this place for organic burgers, you won’t be disappointed!!
Delicious and good service. They have place to stay
Best burger I had in a long time!
Good burger, fantastic fries, friendly and attentive staff.

If you want a really good burger and truffle fries or Mac and cheese in New York, ditch the shake shack and stop here. It just tastes better and it’s a great dining experience. Good salads too! Awesome service. Do it.
bad service, ok food. cheap quality. Try Julianas instead
Food was only ok, but the presentation is really cute, service is really friendly too, plus pice is also really affordable!
Great burger and beer spot! Make sure to get one of the local draft beers, so delicious! Ordered a truffle burger and it was perfectly cooked and flavorful. Staff is friendly and efficient.
Food and drinks were amazing!!!! I don't usually post reviews but people needs to know about this restaurant. Our server, Hyacinth was the best!!
It was pretty tasty for a very reasonable price.

TODAY...8/6/20....Absolutely amazing chicken sandwich with hand cut fries..and the price $10.00 was surprising for such a  Scrumptious and delightful meal.  My server David was very professional and pleasant.  I will definitely come back and spread the word!  GREAT JOB FULTON BURGER.
Must visit if you are a fan of chicken sandwiches and french fries. I'm a picky eater and loved every bit of my take out meal here. The fries were truly the best I've ever had.
Awesome burger!! Grilled veggies also great! Very nice staff! We will be ordering from them often! New favorite burger place!!
The most amazing burgers 🍔!! must check them out drinks always great!!
This spot provides fantastic service and yummy meals. One of my favourite spots ever. The drinks and food came out rapidly and the rates were economical. Recommended.
